TextBody:
Hello Gregory,
 
Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.
Is this only related to Netwrix Access Analyzer (Enterprise Auditor), or does it involve other Netwrix applications?
 
What software is currently installed - run this command from an admin PowerShell
prompt:
Get-CimInstance -Class Win32_Product |Where-Object {($_.Name -Like "Stealth*" -or $_.Name -like "Netwrix*" -or $_.Name -like "Postg*" -or ` $_.Name -like "Python*")} -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
 
Reply to this email with the result/Output of the PowerShell command.
 
Thanks,


Frantz Jean Baptiste
Technical Support T1
Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
____________________ __________
Cybersecurity That Works for You

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ONg2M:ref
Subject: Service account passwords    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ONg2M:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello Gregory,
 
Thank you for the update.
 
I noticed you are still on the 11.5 version; we strongly advise that you upgrade to at least the 11.6 version.
 
Regarding the service account's complexity, you shouldn't have any problem with StealthAUDIT (Netwrix Access Analyzer), but Windows sometimes dislikes some characters. I will double-check with our development team for StealthAUDIT and let you know.
 
Thanks,


Frantz Jean Baptiste
Technical Support T1
Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
____________________ __________

TextBody:
Hello Gregory,
 
As I said in the previous email, we have no issue with the complexity of the password. It's up to you to set it up the way you want it based on your Windows/AD requirements.
Please let me know if you have any questions.
 
Thanks,


Frantz Jean Baptiste
Technical Support T1
